title: LoL Hipster Picks
body: Hi I'm sorta a lol hipster. I ran out of non meta ideas and i need some new ones to try in normals.

replies.body: But the thing is when you play caitlin mid, it destroys your team comp, sooo idk.

Caitlyn mid, perhaps? Pretty much any ADC champ on mid is a hipster pick. Or doomed. If you want a really uncommon pick, try bard, as his arrival was overshadowed by Ekko, and now I rarely see him being used any more. Maybe bard jungle?

> Taric. Any role.

Jungle taric is actually really strong. He's got sustain waveclear and a 2 year stun, I'm surprised it it has no fanbase.
Top Urgot with a full armour pen page (+19 flat at level 1) has always been a personal favourite of mine. The chunk dmg at level 3 is insane.

Fiddle sticks top .. max your drain so that as soon as they come to get you just start it up and they will lose more health than you are losing :) true story ... unless they have lots of cc .. like Riven .. then you are ruined.
Taric top is one of my favorites .. not to uncommon though .. just build full Armour if they are AD of course ;) and you can win pretty much every trade with your ult and crazy Armour and heal. 
Galio mid is kinda meta but no one really plays him. he is super strong tho .. his AP scales off of MR so you can take very little dmg from your lane opponent while still having lots of dmg to poke back  
of course Urgot any lane .. just do it.
Morgana mid is nice too
Quinn top or ADC is usually pretty good for me
and yorric is quite fun top and jungle :)
Darius support, warwick support...swain top, etc
oooh never bothered to buy ekko doe
